name: MEC Ignite Full-Finger Cycling Gloves - Men's
description: These full-finger cycling gloves provide just the right amount of warmth and protection for early morning rides and spring outings. Durable synthetic suede palms and fingers are touch-screen friendly – hello, Instagram!Nylon and Spandex fabric on the back of the hand is highly breathable.Lightweight construction wicks moisture away from your skin.Synthetic suede plam and finger fabric is durable, grippy and touch-screen friendly.Die-cut holes on the palm and fingers helps with heat management.3mm medium density foam padding takes off the edge from rough trails.
